title: 不知道是神马~~~~可能溢出了吧
author: zjy~~~
txt_content:
刚才玩出着个了  Minecraft has crashed!

This error has been saved to X:\导弹\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-08-24_13.47.48-server.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

replies.txt_content:
ryanminecraft 发表于 2012-8-24 13:52 
把mod删啦！！！
要不是MOD冲突，MOD没安好，要不就是内存溢出。跟MOD没有直接联系
